application.doc: Delete Kerberos Configuration Property or Section

param.name: id
param.doc: The name of the property or section to delete. This includes the section and any subsection names. Eg: section/sub-section/property_name. This property is optional. If not specified then the entire configuration will be deleted.

method.name: DELETE
method.id: Delete Kerberos Configuration Property or Section
method.doc: To delete a Kerberos configuration property with the RESTful web service, issue an HTTP DELETE command on the Kerberos configuration resource URI.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

response.doc: There is a problem with the request. The JSON message describes the problem.
File not Found, The requested service does not exist. The JSON message indicates which resource.
An internal error occurred. The JSON message indicates the problem.
